sentences.en: An emergency air-lift of food to central Bamian province was canceled earlier this year when the Taliban bombed the local airport.
sentences.cn: 今年早些时候，塔利班轰炸了当地机场，于是向中部巴米安省运送食物的紧急空运被取消了。

sentences.en: The Taliban are blocking food deliveries to central Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 塔利班正在阻止向阿富汗中部运送食品。
